name: iron(II) chloride production | iron(II) chloride | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10690/documentation

This dataset represents the production of iron(II) chloride, a by-product of steel and iron manufacturing. It is a copy of the ecoinvent v3.0 dataset "iron sulfate production, GLO 1993", the uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.;Iron(II) chloride is used as the main iron input in the production of iron(III) chloride in the region of Qu√©bec.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts with the reception of the raw materials at the production plant gates.

The activity ends with the iron(II) chloride production. The dataset is a "Rough estimation of the electricity use for purification of the by-product. No data for infrastructure and emissions." as cited in original dataset.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: "Investigation for CH." as cited in the original dataset.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: "Chemical product for waste water treatment." as cited in original dataset.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: "From single data to European situation. This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly." as cited in original dataset.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: "Diploma thesis for a waste water treatment plant." as cited in original dataset.
